Package edu.bu.cs411.Users

Class User

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.cs411.Users.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Professor, Student
public abstract class User extends Object
Abstract overall User Class. Maintains all the shared Data by all Users.
